title: The Invisibles Omnibus
description: Collecting for the first time ever all three volumes of controversial and fan-loved series THE INVISIBLES by Eisner Award winning writer Grant Morrison (ALL-STAR SUPERMAN, BATMAN)! Follow the adventures of The Invisibles, a secret organization out to battle against physical and psychic oppression brought upon humanity by the interdemsional alien gods of the Archons of Outer Church!This onmibus collects Invisibles #1-25(1994-96), Invisibles #1-22(1997-99) and Invisibles #12-1(1999-2000).
author: Grant Morrison
